the motivation and context.  Describe any potential impacts on existing
functionality and mention related issues or tasks.

## Checklists

- [ ] I have run `npm run build` and verified that the site builds successfully.
- [ ] I have run `node scripts/check-redirects-cloudflare.mjs` and fixed any redirect syntax errors.
- [ ] I have run `node scripts/check-navigation-sim.mjs` and verified navigation is working.
- [ ] Terraform passes `terraform fmt`, `terraform validate`, and `terraform plan`.
- [ ] I have added or updated tests/documentation as needed.
- [ ] I have updated the `CHANGELOG.md` (if applicable).
